s.$description: Viewport width breakpoint token for small layouts

m.$description: Viewport width breakpoint token for medium-wide layouts

l.$description: Viewport width breakpoint token for wide layouts

stacked.$description: Use for stacked items. Must be dismissable.

floating.$description: Must be in a fixed position related to its container. All stacked and default content beneath it must be reachable through scroll/pan interactions or it must be dimissible.

overlay.$description: Must be related to a sub-task. Must be accompanied with a curtain.

context.$description: Must be triggered through right-click/long press. Must be dismissible through clicking outside the area.

time-sensitive.$description: Must be related to something that happened in the system at that exact moment that is useful for the user to know. Must be dismissible or time-based.

cursor.$description: Must be user-triggered and related to the cursors/pointers current position. Must be dismissible with escape key.
